p: Internalization is a first step required to process and present antigens in an appropriate form to prime the specific immune response [ 59, 60]. It is well known that imDCs are highly endocytic cells compared to mature DCs [ 59]. The immunomodulatory effect of BSEO stimulation on the endocytic capacity of DCs was evaluated after 24 h using FITC-dextran uptake and compared to LPS and vitamin D3 treated DCs. Data demonstrated that BSEO (5 μg/mL or 10 μg/mL) increased the endocytic capacity of DCs similarly to vitamin D3-treated DCs.
